DataElement.preferredName: Product Investigation Performed Observation Outcome Data Null Type Reason ISO21090.ST.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Information captured while conducting research on a product. EXAMPLE(S): An electrical problem in a device. The text and/or code that describes why no result was provided. EXAMPLE(S): (1) Subject refused to answer question. (2) Error message returned by equipment to explain why the device was unable to produce a result.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Product Investigation Performed Observation Outcome Data Null Type Reason
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced.:The act or process of a systematic and thorough examination; research, study; the process of inquiring into or following up, intended to develop facts.:Executed and carried through to completion.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:The result of an action._A collection or single item of factual information, derived from measurement or research, from which conclusions may be drawn.:A special value that may be stored in some database columns to represent an unknown, missing, not applicable, or undefined value.:Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.:An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.
